0:00 Hello I'm BTS' V
0:04 Kim Taehyung's happiness list.
0:08 First, it is taking pictures. Showing you the beautiful pictures I took using my film camera is my happiness.
0:20 Second, I don't really enjoy this back then but as I got in BTS, I really like looking at paintings so I look up to old painters and photographers to look at their paintings and pictures, it's really a healing thing.
0:55 Playing games. Third is playing games, meeting my friends and play games together is something I think which is really precious and because of that I do that a lot in a day (playing games).
1:11 Forth, going on holiday. Going (on holiday) with the people I care about and make memories, good memories, is my happiness.
1:26 Fifth, sleeping. There's nothing more comfortable more than sleeping.
1:31 Sixth, eating. There's nothing more happier than getting to eat. Eating something delicious is the best.
1:43 Seventh, wearing nice clothes. Clothes is my life, wearing nice clothes somehow increase my confidence.
1:58 Eighth, watching movies. I really don't like watching horror/thriller movie and I still got many movies that I want to watch. I will watch them for sure.
2:12 Ninth, playing with Yeontan. Cool jam.
2:18 Tenth, being with my family. Just being with them is making me really happy
2:26 Thank you. Bye


P/S excuse my grammar or any errors occurred. By all means, pardon my English 🙃🙏 hope this helps.
